page.title: 11FAMILY LIFE 8.
page.content: I usually start to prepare the evening meal in the late afternoon so that when the children return I can start cooking. We usually have some form of meat with vegetables and then a pudding. The meat could be anything from a meat pie to sliced meat,sausages, hamburgers,fish(cooked in various ways),casseroles or a roast joint. Vegetables are usually potatoes or some form of pasta or rice, and then one or two of the following;cabbage, peas,carrots,sweetcorn,broccoli, swede,cougettes,brussel sprouts, or any other vegetable I may have. For puddings we usually have either a piece of friut,ice-cream,tinned fruit,fruit pies,trifles,jelly,caramel puddings,rice puddings,yoghurts in fact anything that is nice to follow the main meat dish.
